mapper.select: select b.no as no, a.name as userName, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.hit as hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth as depth, b.user_no as userNo, b.delete_bool as deleteBool from user a join board b on a.no = b.user_no order by b.group_no desc, b.order_no asc limit #{startPost }, 10
select no, title, contents, hit, reg_date as regDate, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth as depth, user_no as userNo, delete_bool as deleteBool from board where no=#{no }
update board set hit = hit + 1 where no=#{no }
mapper.update: update board set delete_bool = 0 where no=#{no }
